segments.text: I am very nervous about signing my escrow papers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Escrow involves a lot of paperwork , but I will explain all of the steps to you as we go along .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should I have brought with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The only thing I will need to see is your driver ’ s license , as I will be notarizing these papers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel a little overwhelmed by so many papers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about how many papers there are . We are going to look at them one at a time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My boyfriend is an attorney and told me that I could fax him anything if I had a question .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please get any outside help that you need in understanding your escrow documents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this the last thing that I will need to do before the house becomes mine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At the close of escrow , the house will be yours !
segments.speaker: S2
